TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConsoleTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 將追蹤或偵錯輸出直接導向到標準輸出或標準錯誤資料流。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output to either the standard output or the standard error stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來寫入追蹤和偵錯的訊息至主控台。Use the class to write trace and debugging messages to the console. 您可以初始化物件寫入至追蹤訊息資料流或資料流。You can initialize a object to write trace messages to the stream or to the stream. > [!IMPORTANT] > 介面。 interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try`/ `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a`try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 當追蹤和偵錯輸出已啟用，訊息會寫入至指定資料流，訊息會寫入使用方式很類似或方法。When trace and debugging output is enabled, the messages are written to the specified stream, which is similar to the way messages are written with the or methods. 在主控台應用程式中，輸出和錯誤資料流寫入訊息至現有的主控台視窗中，或寫入資料流將重新導向執行個體。In a console application, the output and error streams write messages to the existing console window, or you can redirect the streams to write to a instance. > [!NOTE] > 如果主控台不存在，如同在 Windows 架構應用程式時，不會顯示訊息寫入主控台。If the console does not exist, as in a Windows-based application, messages written to the console are not displayed. 新增至適當的物件集合，如果您想要透過撰寫郵件， ，或寫入至主控台。Add a object to the appropriate collection if you want messages written through , , or to be written to the console. 此外，您可以寫入訊息直接主控台使用或方法。In addition, you can write messages directly to the console using the or methods. > [!NOTE] > 和類別共用相同集合，透過其各自存取`Listeners`屬性。The and classes share the same collection, accessed through their respective `Listeners` properties. 如果您將加入另一個類別會自動使用相同的接聽程式来使用其中一個類別，在集合的物件。If you add a object to the collection using one of these classes, the other class automatically uses the same listener. 大多數的編譯器會啟用追蹤和偵錯輸出透過條件式編譯旗標。Most compilers enable trace and debug output through conditional compilation flags. 如果您未啟用追蹤或偵錯訊息寫入到和類別會有效地被忽略。If you do not enable tracing or debugging, the messages written through the and classes are effectively ignored. 啟用追蹤和偵錯輸出的語法是特定; 編譯器如果您使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 以外的編譯器，請參閱編譯器的文件。The syntax to enable trace and debug output is compiler specific; if you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要啟用偵錯 C# 中，加入**/d: debug**旗標設為編譯器命令列，當您編譯程式碼，或者您可以加入**#define 偵錯**加入您的檔案頂端。To enable debugging in C#, add the **/d:DEBUG**flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add **#define DEBUG** to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，加入**/d: debug = True**編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the **/d:DEBUG=True** flag to the compiler command line. - 若要啟用追蹤，在 C# 中的，加入**/d:TRACE**旗標設為編譯器命令列，當您編譯程式碼，或新增**#define 追蹤**加入您的檔案頂端。To enable tracing in C#, add the **/d:TRACE** flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add **#define TRACE** to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，加入**/d:TRACE = True**編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the **/d:TRACE=True** flag to the compiler command line. 您可以加入物件集合，您的程式碼，或者您可以加入物件透過應用程式組態檔的集合。You can add a object to the collection in your code, or you can add a object to the collection through the application configuration file. 新增來寫入訊息的特定程式碼區段或執行路徑的程式碼中的物件。Add the object in your code to write messages for a specific code section or execution path. 新增應用程式執行時，直接所有追蹤和偵錯您應用程式組態檔中的物件訊息至主控台。Add the object in your application configuration file to direct all trace and debug messages to the console while the application executes. 若要寫入追蹤和偵錯程式碼的特定區段的主控台訊息，初始化物件，並將它加入至集合。To write trace and debug messages to the console for a specific section of code, initialize a object and add it to the collection. 檢測包含訊息使用的程式碼區段或類別。Instrument the section of code that contains messages using the or classes. 在程式碼區段結束時，移除物件從集合，並呼叫方法。At the end of the code section, remove the object from the collection, and call the method on the . 若要直接所有追蹤和偵錯主控台訊息，應用程式執行時，新增應用程式組態檔的物件。To direct all trace and debug messages to the console while the application executes, add a object to the application configuration file. 編輯對應到您的應用程式名稱的組態檔或 app.config 檔案中的[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]專案。Edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application, or the app.config file in a [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] project. 在此檔案中，插入的項目。In this file, insert an element for a . 下列範例會將名為物件`configConsoleListener`至集合。The following example adds a object named `configConsoleListener` to the collection. ``` ``` 如需在應用程式組態檔中加入追蹤接聽項的詳細資訊，請參閱[<接聽程式>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-trace.md)。For details about adding trace listeners in the application configuration file, see [<listeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-trace.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作的組成類別具有兩個公用方法的主控台應用程式。The following code example implements a console application consisting of a class with two public methods. `Main`方法會檢查命令列引數，並判斷是否應該將追蹤輸出導向至標準錯誤資料流或標準輸出資料流。The `Main` method examines the command-line arguments and determines if trace output should be directed to the standard error stream or the standard output stream. `Main` 建立並初始化物件指定輸出資料流，並將此物件加入至追蹤接聽程式集合。`Main` creates and initializes a object for the specified output stream, and adds this object to the trace listener collection. 然後它會呼叫`WriteEnvironmentInfoToTrace`方法，這個方法會寫入執行環境和追蹤輸出的追蹤接聽程式組態的相關詳細資料。It then calls the `WriteEnvironmentInfoToTrace` method, which writes details about the executing environment and the trace listener configuration to the trace output. 範例應用程式執行時，環境和追蹤組態詳細資料會寫入指定的主控台輸出資料流透過物件。When the example application runs, the environment and trace configuration details are written to the specified console output stream through the object. [!code-csharp[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/VB/consoletrace.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，附追蹤輸出寫入至標準輸出資料流。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with trace output written to the standard output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化要寫入訊息至物件資料流。This constructor initializes a object to write messages to the stream. 其屬性會初始化為空字串 ("")。Its property is initialized to an empty string (""). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會初始化物件指定輸出資料流，並將它加入追蹤接聽程式集合。The following code example initializes a object for the specified output stream and adds it to the trace listener collection. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/VB/consoletrace.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool useErrorStream) cil managed

param.name: useErrorStream
param.span: 如果是 ，就表示要將追蹤與偵錯輸出寫入至標準錯誤資料流；如果是 ，則表示要寫入追蹤與偵錯輸出至標準輸出資料流。

span.span: to write tracing and debugging output to the standard error stream; to write tracing and debugging output to the standard output stream.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，附寫入追蹤輸出至標準輸出資料流或標準錯誤資料流的選項。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with an option to write trace output to the standard output stream or the standard error stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化物件，將訊息寫入 或資料流。This constructor initializes a object to write messages to either the or the stream. 其屬性會初始化為空字串 ("")。Its property is initialized to an empty string (""). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會初始化物件指定輸出資料流，並將它加入追蹤接聽程式集合。The following code example initializes a object for the specified output stream and adds it to the trace listener collection. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/VB/consoletrace.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉輸出到為此追蹤接聽項所指定的資料流。

span.span: Closes the output to the stream specified for this trace listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個指定之資料流執行個體 (任一資料流或資料流) 已關閉。The stream specified for this instance (either the stream or the stream) is closed.
